channel.title: Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog

item.title: Gradually Migrate SwiftUI in Production
item.description: Swift ID Dev is an Indonesian study group community that is being organized by Nico. In this session, I mentored iOS developers about how to gradually migrate production code to SwiftUI. Github: https://github.com/abadikaka/SwiftUIUIKitMigrationExample Tripzy - Track Your Trip Expenses - Enjoy one of compact travel's budget trackers, directly through your pocket. No hassle, to the point, and without no login required along with the intuitive dashboard Tripzy gives you access to create your travel expenses and track them easily from your device without any hassle.

item.title: Discover Swift Package Manager
item.description: Swift ID Dev is an Indonesian study group community that is being organized by Nico. In this session, I mentored iOS developers about how to create a simple package manager for personal project as well basic foundation of a modularization. Slides: https://github.com/abadikaka/conference-and-talks/blob/main/SPM.key Tripzy - Track Your Trip Expenses - Enjoy one of compact travel's budget trackers, directly through your pocket. No hassle, to the point, and without no login required along with the intuitive dashboard Tripzy gives you access to create your travel expenses and track them easily from your device without any hassle.

item.title: Mentorship in WWDC Community 2021
item.description: WWDC Mentorship Week, organized by WWDC Community 2021. During this WWDC 2021 week, I volunteered to help the community by giving a free mentorship and share my experience about working as an iOS Engineer to those who booked my sessions. I have succesfully mentored 12 student from Indonesia and 1 student from Malaysia. Tripzy - Track Your Trip Expenses - Enjoy one of compact travel's budget trackers, directly through your pocket.

item.title: iOS Dev Thailand Conference 2020
item.description: Session 1 : Unboxing the debugger: Broke the myth of debugging in iOS in an easy way by Michael Abadi, Agoda. In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Federico Zanetello about Swift Package Manager Tripzy - Track Your Trip Expenses - Enjoy one of compact travel's budget trackers, directly through your pocket. No hassle, to the point, and without no login required along with the intuitive dashboard Tripzy gives you access to create your travel expenses and track them easily from your device without any hassle.

item.title: iOS Indonesia Conference 2020
item.description: In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Edward Anthony about Network Abstraction Layer and Bondan Eko Prasetyo about Modularization at Scale. Tripzy - Track Your Trip Expenses - Enjoy one of compact travel's budget trackers, directly through your pocket. No hassle, to the point, and without no login required along with the intuitive dashboard Tripzy gives you access to create your travel expenses and track them easily from your device without any hassle.
